main.node: Add Emails to Send in History

name: Send Email Automation for Leads in Boost 2025 CRM - Sub-Workflow

assignments.name: raw
assignments.value:
={{ "From: "+ $('Data Workflow').item.json.De + "
To: "+$('Data Workflow').item.json['Contact Email'] + "
Subject: "+ $('Replace Variable').item.json.Sujet+ "
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: multipart/related; boundary=boundary1

--boundary1
Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8

<html>
<body>
"
+ $('Message settings').item.json.body_html+"
</body>
</html>

--boundary1
Content-Type: "+$json.mime_type+"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: base64
Content-Disposition: inline
Content-ID: <image1>

"
+$json.img_base_64
+"

--boundary1--
" }}

parameters.filterByFormula: =AND({Groupe Automatisation} = "{{ $('Data Workflow').item.json['Groupe Automatisation'] }}", {Séquence} = {{ $('Data Workflow').item.json['Prochaine Séquence'] + 1 }}, {Type} = "{{ $('When Executed by Another Workflow').item.json.Type }}")

nodes.name: Add Emails to Send in History
